menus

Class Button

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.Rectangle
          • menus.Button
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Button
extends java.awt.Rectangle
    This class is made to be used during the Menu processing. (GameState = 0) Each Button is going to be either one of the following texts : "PLAY", "OPTIONS" , "SHOPS" , "EXIT" , or any other similar button in other menus Each button has a boolean "selected" if it's True then the button needs to be shown in a bigger font and with two guns drawn at it's sides (for the main menu) The class is inherited from Rectangle class to be able to use the related methods regarding size and position.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(java.awt.Graphics g)
      Drawing the button, which would be called at the menu class If the button's selected parameter is true then the second font and second color are to be drawn(second font has a bigger size) And at the end two guns would be drawn around the selected button.
      void setSelected(boolean selected)
      The method that would change the "selected" variable to the given input.
